title: Overview
text: Bano Qabil is a free IT and professional skills training initiative by Alkhidmat Foundation Pakistan that equips youth with modern digital and technical skills. It bridges academic knowledge to employment through structured courses and certification.

title: Impact: Students Trained
text: Bano Qabil has trained over 75,000 students through its programs, empowering them with technology and career-ready skills.”

title: Impact: Active Facilities
text: Bano Qabil operates more than 50 active training facilities to make education accessible across regions of Pakistan.

title: Impact: Incubation Centres
text: Bano Qabil has established 6 incubation centres to support students in building real projects and portfolios.

title: Impact: High Tech Courses
text: Bano Qabil offers 29 advanced tech courses designed to teach in-demand skills aligned with the job market.

title: Impact: Registered Tech Employees
text: Over 100,000 tech employees have been registered through Bano Qabil’s program network.

title: Services Offered: Advanced IT Training
text: Bano Qabil provides Advanced IT Training that helps learners gain practical, job-ready skills aligned with industry standards.

title: Services Offered: Strategic Incubation Centre
text: The Strategic Incubation Centre offers hands-on project experience and portfolio building support for participants.

title: Services Offered: Dedicated Job Portal
text: Bano Qabil’s job portal connects students with job openings, freelancing opportunities, and career guidance.

title: Admission Roadmap
text: Bano Qabil follows an 8-step admission process: Registration, Aptitude Test, Interview, Security Deposit, Campus Selection, Class Commencement, Examination, and Certification.

title: Certification: LRN
text: Bano Qabil courses are certified by the Learning Resource Network (LRN), ensuring international recognition.

title: Certification: SBTE
text: Sindh Board of Technical Education (SBTE) provides certification for applicable courses at Bano Qabil.

title: Certification: SDC
text: Skills Development Council (SDC) collaborates with Bano Qabil for accredited skill certificates.

title: Admission FAQs
text: Bano Qabil FAQs cover eligibility, security deposit, registration process, and attendance requirements. Registration opens on official channels; classes are physical; security deposit is PKR 3,000 refundable upon completion.

title: Course FAQs
text: Bano Qabil courses are free-of-cost and run for approximately 3 months. Eligible applicants from ages 14–30 can register. Only one course can be taken at a time, and classes are held in-person.

title: Contact Information
text: Head Office: 501, Quaideen Colony, Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan. Phone: 021-111-503504 Ext 194. WhatsApp: 0317-8226242. Email: banoqabil.khi@alkhidmat.com.

title: Founder & Patron-in-Chief
text: Hafiz Naeem ur Rehman launched the Bano Qabil initiative under Alkhidmat Foundation Pakistan to empower youth with IT and vocational skills.

title: Chairman
text: Mr. Naveed Ali Baig serves as the Chairman of Bano Qabil Pakistan, guiding the program's vision for skill development and youth empowerment.

title: Nationwide Presence
text: Bano Qabil operates campuses across Pakistan: 27 in Punjab, 8 in Sindh, 5 in Balochistan, 33 in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, 5 in Azad Kashmir, and additional centers in Islamabad and Gilgit.

title: Impact & Reach
text: The initiative has enrolled thousands of students, conducted IT training at multiple centers, and successfully graduated numerous participants into IT and vocational careers.

title: Focus Areas
text: Bano Qabil emphasizes IT, digital marketing, cybersecurity, entrepreneurship, and business training, providing fully-funded, advanced skill programs.

title: Inclusivity & Support
text: The program actively supports women and underprivileged students, providing resources, mentorship, and hands-on project experience.

title: Partnerships & Collaborations
text: Bano Qabil partners with tech companies, educational institutions, and industry experts to enhance training quality and job placement opportunities.

title: Future Plans
text: Bano Qabil aims to expand its reach, introduce new courses, and strengthen industry connections to further empower Pakistan's youth.
